title: We need a fun Nautilus skin
body: All his skins are badass, which is cool, but Naut is quite fun, and he deserves a funny skin, I'd like to see a onesie Nautilus!

replies.body: How is AstroNautilus not a fun skin? He literally moon-walks and does emotes on his space visor.

As a Nautilus main, and someone who has made it a rule to only purchase ridiculous goofy skins, I could not agree more. 

If I had my way there'd be a Naut for every skin line. HEATSEEKER NAUTILUS?! POOL PARTY NAUTILUS?! Definitely Not Nautilus where he's just wearing creepily cobbled together parts of Blitzcrank! C'MON!

Luckily much more intelligent beings than I make these decisions.
What about Definitely Notilus
I like the cut of your jib, Spideraxe. I like the cut of your jib.

http://imgur.com/APzo7

we know we want it
DUDE THAT HOOK hahahahahahaha
Definitely Not-tilius
You've made the joke second. And while this is tragic, you may have an upvote.

Anchorman Nautilus

Goes alongside Forecast Janna.

Just Nautilus with a suit, and with a stereotypical handsome-man newscaster voice.

I always imagined subterranean nautilus to be a lava diver of sorts, kind of like molten rammus with his armour fueled by it.

I'd personally love a naut skin in battlecast, elderwood, nuclear, mecha or even..... A SKIN DEPICTING HIM BEFORE HE GOT IN THE SUIT
Bruh, this is for silly nautilus' only! But that's okay. Any Nautilus idea is a good Nautilus idea. League of Nautilus 2018!
brainstorming for april fools 2018 already

> [{quoted}](name=Riot TreblMuffin,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zNljEy2s,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-05-09T21:41:34.505+0000)
>
> As a Nautilus main, and someone who has made it a rule to only purchase ridiculous goofy skins, I could not agree more. 
> 
> If I had my way there'd be a Naut for every skin line. HEATSEEKER NAUTILUS?! POOL PARTY NAUTILUS?! Definitely Not Nautilus where he's just wearing creepily cobbled together parts of Blitzcrank! C'MON!
> 
> Luckily much more intelligent beings than I make these decisions.

I could get behind pool party Nautilus, make him that one guy who brings WAAAAYYY too much to the pool, you know the type, while everyone else is just chilling he's going all secret mission scuba diver with improvised pool noodle armor and junk
Hahahaha. New Pool Party Renekton VO, "Bro you have no chill."
TreblMuffin, ever thought about Meowtilus?

Naut Nautilus.

He is disguised as himself.
Mafia Nautilus- has a fancy suit over top of his normal diving suit

Pool party Naut! That would be fun! 

Man, the recall of pool party Renekton is the coolest thing ever in League... 

Also, the dance of moo cow Alistar is so BM that even your own team can end up reporting you =D

I want something similar with Naut, his original skin is already very fun, and there's endless possibility to make something crazy
Anchorman Nautalus.
The community has been clamoring for Anchorman Nautilus, as part of the Forecast/Primetime skin line. I'd love to see that too, it would be instabuy for me tbh
need a definitely nautilus skin. as opposed to the definitely not skin line.

This is a great suggestion.

That said, can we please make sure whatever new skins Naut gets, his head doesn't look too cartoonishly big and weird? I'm looking at you, Worldbreaker Nautilus!

(Unless, of course, we purposefully give him a huge Mascot Head, a la Draven Draven.)

we need more fisherman skin, jax and fizz are good but a good old tank with a hook so they can go to a fishing trip together would be dope.

My vote then go to fisherman nautilus
what about Nautilaughs he gets a hook that's chattering teeth and he could be in a jack in a box kind of way. or he can even be a clown with big red shoes.
